attributes.review:
First off, my phone has not acted the same since I downloaded this. All of my pictures are GONE. All of my contacts are GONE. All of my personal information is GONE. MY PHONE IS VERY SLOW NOW. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! IT RUINS THE FUNCTION OF YOUR PHONE!!! 

 I downloaded this app because I was dedicated to keeping American great.... but that doesn’t mean what I thought it did. 

Trump is a narcissist. He only wants to benefit white millionaires like him. Yes! I know! Not racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, unintelligent, incompetent, disgraceful, unethical, flat out dumb low-lives like all of you that want to vote for him.  He doesn’t care about you! Just himself! Save yourself from voting for him and vote for Biden who actually cares about each and every person in the United States of America! 🇺🇸
attributes.title: RUINED MY PHONE DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: when i downloaded this i got a bunch of inappropriate spam and ads i found out that they were tracking my location etc etc
App took way to long to download and was ridiculously hard to use. Would not recommend to anyone
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app a few minutes ago really hoping to get the most out of it, as I am a PROUD Trump supporter, as are my husband, Wyatt Supra-Messi, and four beautiful children, Brentlyn, Tairince, Quartneigh, and Ray-Sisem. But as soon as I opened the app, my phone crashed and all of the data on my phone was taken and sold to the RUSSIAN GOVERNMENT!!!! On my screen, an urgent notification flashed saying “I am here to take your hard-earned money from your online crafting blog and GIVE IT to the GREEDY SOCIALISTS!!!!!- Joe Biden”. Needless to say, I nearly fainted. I’m glad it happened, though, otherwise I would have never found out that this app for the best president in history is merely a HOAX filled with SOCIALIST PROPAGANDA!!!! Apple should remove this app from the appstore to prevent further incidences like this. I am even tempted to speak to the manager of Apple to get some real answers!!! -Kkkristen Supra-Messi
attributes.title: very unsatisfied :(

attributes.title: ⚠️WORST APP EVER BEWARE ⚠️

attributes.review: My niece told me about a swell of reviews on this app with mostly negative ratings. As an adult, I’m sick of the Generation Z antics and can’t wait for the election so we can see who the real adults really are. I decided to download this app so that I could leave a fair review. My voice among so many screenagers won’t be too loud, but I’ll use it until my dying day. Unfortunately, as much as I adore President Donald Trump, I cant bring myself to give this app more than one star. It took 76 hours to download, and I had to clear personal photos to make room! The app is wholly unmanageable and the text is way too small to read. The app frequently blacks out and makes my whole phone turn off, at which point I hear a little Russian voice saying, ‘he’s onto us!’ which isn’t funny. As a blue-collar American, I believe that our President will succeed off the backs of hardworking Americans, not snowflakes who need apps to keep them informed when newspapers still exist. I recommend Apple delete this app before the Russians get involved and I hope Mr. Trump knows that this isn’t the way to reach his supporters. God Bless America.
attributes.title: Unimpressed MAGA fan
